head.title: Insert one document into another in {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Combine {{FileFormatUp}} files easily with {{ProgLang}}. {{ProdShortName}} simplifies the process of merging documents in just a few lines of code.

header.title: Embed content into {{FileFormatUp}} files effortlessly
header.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to seamlessly insert one {{FileFormatUp}} document into another. Get precise results with flexible and reliable tools.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile solution for handling documents. It enables you to integrate one document into another with ease, supporting over 50 formats such as PDFs and MS Office files. Tailor your output by merging, editing, and organizing content exactly how you want.

more_features.title: Advanced tools to simplify document integration
more_features.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, embedding documents is straightforward and customizable, no matter the file type. Achieve clean and consistent results across your projects.

feature_1.title: Create reports using business data
feature_1.content: Fill documents with data from sources like JSON, XML, or CSV quickly and reliably, streamlining your workflows.

feature_2.title: Enhance documents with visual content
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} lets you insert tables, charts, and lists alongside text, hyperlinks, images, and even dynamic barcodes.

feature_3.title: Place data exactly where it belongs
feature_3.content: LINQ templates help position your data with precision, handle repeating elements like arrays, and apply custom styles effortlessly.

feature_4.title: Compatible with diverse file formats
feature_4.content: Merge documents across various formats, including PDFs, HTML, MS Office files, and OpenOffice, ensuring flexibility for your projects.

formats.title: Merge across different document types
formats.description: With {{EnvName}}, you can embed and combine content across more than 50 file formats. Add files seamlessly to create professional results.

operations.title: Key capabilities at a glance
operations.description: Discover the extensive features {{ProdShortName}} offers to make embedding and combining documents efficient and hassle-free.

examples.comment_1: Use this tag in your template to mark the spot for the embedded document
examples.comment_2: Set the file path for the main template
examples.comment_3: Provide the path to the document you want to insert
examples.comment_4: Save the final file with the embedded content

steps.title: Steps to insert a document into a {{FileFormatUp}} file

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes embedding one {{FileFormatUp}} document into another simple and customizable.
content.step_1: Prepare a {{FileFormatUp}} template with placeholders for the embedded content.
content.step_2: Specify the file path for the template.
content.step_3: Provide the file path for the document to embed.
content.step_4: Save the output file with the merged content.

code_1.title: How to programmatically insert an image into a document
code_1.content: This example shows how to embed an image into a {{FileFormatUp}} file using {{ProdShortName}}.
code_1.comment_1: Add a placeholder tag in the template file
code_1.comment_2: Define the path to the template
code_1.comment_3: Specify the path to the image
code_1.comment_5: Save the file with the embedded image

texts_pdf.step_1: Create a template with placeholders for the embedded content (PDF templates are not supported).
texts_pdf.step_4: Save the final file with the merged content as a PDF.
texts_pdf.comment_tmp: PDF templates are not supported at the moment.
